job_tasks.phrase: Je bent een developer die bouwt aan Pontifexx Paddock, ons digitale platform voor Asset Management.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core responsibility of building and developing a digital platform, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Met jouw technische expertise help je de organisatie groeien en maak je het verschil door het ontwikkelen van krachtige, gebruiksvriendelijke applicaties.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of applications and contributing to organizational growth through technical expertise, aligning with software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Daarnaast pak je praktijkgerichte issues en verbetervoorstellen op die door onze klanten worden aangedragen en zorg je voor een passende oplossing.
job_tasks.justification: Addressing practical issues and implementing solutions for customer-driven proposals is a typical software development task related to maintenance and improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met onze specialisten op het gebied van Maintenance, IFS Ultimo, AI en BI om nieuwe functies en koppelingen te realiseren die onze dienstverlening versterken.
job_tasks.justification: Realizing new features and integrations, even when collaborating with AI/BI specialists, is a core software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: In deze functie krijg je de kans om de bestaande technische basis van Pontifexx Paddock verder uit te bouwen.
job_tasks.justification: Expanding the existing technical foundation of a platform is a direct software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: We hanteren al een moderne stack bestaande uit verschillende frameworks en cloudservices, maar we staan open voor jouw inbreng om deze nóg beter te maken.
job_tasks.justification: Working with and improving a modern tech stack (frameworks, cloud services) is a software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt dus de ruimte om met nieuwe ideeën te komen en samen met het team te bepalen welke technische verbeteringen echt verschil maken.
job_tasks.justification: Coming up with new ideas and determining technical improvements is part of the software development process, often involving collaboration and strategic input.

job_tasks.phrase: Zo draag je bij aan best practices, performance optimalisaties en de toekomstige richting van ons platform.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to best practices, performance optimizations, and the future direction of a platform are all aspects of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Met Pontifexx Paddock combineren we AI en BI om Asset Management naar een hoger niveau te brengen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the strategic goal of using AI and BI to elevate Asset Management, indicating an understanding of business objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met onze specialisten op het gebied van Maintenance, IFS Ultimo, AI en BI om nieuwe functies en koppelingen te realiseren die onze dienstverlening versterken.
soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Je werkt nauw samen' (You work closely together) explicitly points to collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: We staan open voor jouw inbreng om deze nóg beter te maken. Je hebt dus de ruimte om met nieuwe ideeën te komen en samen met het team te bepalen welke technische verbeteringen echt verschil maken.
soft_skills.justification: Being open to input, having space for new ideas, and determining technical improvements indicates innovation and a degree of ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks such as building, developing, integrating features, and improving an existing platform. While AI and BI are mentioned as technologies used within the platform, the core responsibilities described do not involve the development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or specialized data management of AI/ML models themselves. The role is about building and enhancing a software product that *uses* AI/BI, rather than being an AI/ML specialist or engineer. Therefore, the 'Software Engineer' profile is the most appropriate fit.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development responsibilities. However, the mention of 'AI' and 'BI' without specifying the nature of the AI work (e.g., model development, integration of pre-trained models, prompt engineering) leaves a slight ambiguity. It's clear the role is software-focused, but the exact depth of AI involvement isn't detailed enough to definitively rule out a more AI-adjacent role without further context. The confidence is high because the primary tasks are unequivocally software engineering.
